description:
Lancer of Red was originally http://anidb.net/ch92256 [Feend vor Sembren]`s Servant. His current Master is http://anidb.net/ch88727 [Shirou Kotomine].
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]His true name is Karna, the Son of the Sun God, the invulnerable hero of the Indian epic Mahabharata, as a hero on the vanquished side. The central conflict of The Mahabharata is the war over influence between the Pandava and Kaurava royal family. Karna became famous as the rival of Arjuna, the great hero of Hindu mythology.
He possesses multiple Noble Phantasms - Kavacha and Kundala, Brahmastra, Brahmastra Kundala, and Vasavi Shakti - that make him invulnerable and grant him powerful fire attacks.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Aka no Lancer
